Title: Authorizes a parking permit system for park-and-rides in the borough of Staten Island in the city of New York
Summary: Authorizes a parking permit system for park-and-rides in the borough of Staten Island in the city of New York; requires residents of Staten Island to receive a permit free of charge and out-of-state residents to pay an annual fee for such permit.
LawCode: Add ยง1640-r, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to parking permit systems for park-and-rides on Staten Island
